text: Henri Antoine Marie Teissier (21 July 1929 â€“ 1 December 2020) , La Croix, 1 december 2020 was a French-Algerian Catholic prelate. He was the Bishop of Algiers and Archbishop Emeritus of Algiers from 1998 to 2008. He was born in Lyon, France. Teissier died on 1 December 2020 at a hospital in Lyon from problems caused by multiple strokes at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Lyon Category:People from Algiers Category:French Roman Catholics Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Henri Teissier
